name: begin
description: returns the last expression in a sequence after evaluating the sequence in order.

name: begin_random
description: evaluates the sequence of expressions in random order and returns the last value evaluated.

name: if
description: returns one of two values based on the value of a condition.

name: cond
description: returns the value associated with the first true condition.

name: set
description: set the value of a global variable.

name: and
description: returns true if all specified expressions are true.

name: or
description: returns true if any specified expressions are true.
returns the sum of all specified expressions.
returns the difference of two expressions.
returns the product of all specified expressions.
returns the quotient of two expressions.

name: min
description: returns the minimum of all specified expressions.

name: max
description: returns the maximum of all specified expressions.
returns true if two expressions are equal
returns true if two expressions are not equal
returns true if the first number is larger than the second.
returns true if the first number is smaller than the second.
returns true if the first number is larger than or equal to the second.
returns true if the first number is smaller than or equal to the second.

name: sleep
description: pauses execution of this script (or, optionally, another script) for the specified number of ticks.

name: sleep_until
description: pauses execution of this script until the specified condition is true, checking once per second unless a different number of ticks is specified.

name: wake
description: wakes a sleeping script in the next update.

name: inspect
description: prints the value of an expression to the screen for debugging purposes.

name: unit
description: converts an object to a unit.

name: ai_debug_communication_suppress
description: suppresses (or stops suppressing) a set of AI communication types.

name: ai_debug_communication_ignore
description: ignores (or stops ignoring) a set of AI communication types when printing out communications.

name: ai_debug_communication_focus
description: focuses (or stops focusing) a set of unit vocalization types.

name: not
description: returns the opposite of the expression.

name: print
description: prints a string to the console.

name: players
description: returns a list of the players

name: volume_teleport_players_not_inside
description: moves all players outside a specified trigger volume to a specified flag.

name: volume_test_object
description: returns true if the specified object is within the specified volume.

name: volume_test_objects
description: returns true if any of the specified objects are within the specified volume.

name: volume_test_objects_all
description: returns true if any of the specified objects are within the specified volume.

name: object_teleport
description: moves the specified object to the specified flag.

name: object_set_facing
description: turns the specified object in the direction of the specified flag.

name: object_set_shield
description: sets the shield vitality of the specified object (between 0 and 1).

name: object_set_permutation
description: sets the desired region (use "" for all regions) to the permutation with the given name, e.g. (object_set_permutation flood "right arm" ~damaged)

name: object_create
description: creates an object from the scenario.

name: object_destroy
description: destroys an object.

name: object_create_anew
description: creates an object, destroying it first if it already exists.

name: object_create_containing
description: creates all objects from the scenario whose names contain the given substring.

name: object_create_anew_containing
description: creates anew all objects from the scenario whose names contain the given substring.

name: object_destroy_containing
description: destroys all objects from the scenario whose names contain the given substring.

name: object_destroy_all
description: destroys all non player objects.

name: list_get
description: returns an item in an object list.

name: list_count
description: returns the number of objects in a list

name: effect_new
description: starts the specified effect at the specified flag.

name: effect_new_on_object_marker
description: starts the specified effect on the specified object at the specified marker.

name: damage_new
description: causes the specified damage at the specified flag.

name: damage_object
description: causes the specified damage at the specified object.

name: objects_can_see_object
description: returns true if any of the specified units are looking within the specified number of degrees of the object.

name: objects_can_see_flag
description: returns true if any of the specified units are looking within the specified number of degrees of the flag.

name: objects_delete_by_definition
description: deletes all objects of type <definition>

name: sound_set_gain
description: absolutely do not use this

name: sound_get_gain
description: absolutely do not use this either

name: script_recompile
description: recompiles scripts.

name: script_doc
description: saves a file called hs_doc.txt with parameters for all script commands.

name: help
description: prints a description of the named function.

name: random_range
description: returns a random value in the range [lower bound, upper bound)

name: real_random_range
description: returns a random value in the range [lower bound, upper bound)

name: numeric_countdown_timer_set
description: <milliseconds>, <auto_start>

name: numeric_countdown_timer_get
description: <digit_index>

name: breakable_surfaces_enable
description: enables or disables breakability of all breakable surfaces on level

name: recording_play
description: make the specified unit run the specified cutscene recording.

name: recording_play_and_delete
description: make the specified unit run the specified cutscene recording, deletes the unit when the animation finishes.

name: recording_play_and_hover
description: make the specified vehicle run the specified cutscene recording, hovers the vehicle when the animation finishes.

name: recording_kill
description: kill the specified unit's cutscene recording.

name: recording_time
description: return the time remaining in the specified unit's cutscene recording.

name: object_set_ranged_attack_inhibited
description: FALSE prevents object from using ranged attack

name: object_set_melee_attack_inhibited
description: FALSE prevents object from using melee attack

name: objects_dump_memory
description: debugs object memory usage

name: object_set_collideable
description: FALSE prevents any object from colliding with the given object

name: object_set_scale
description: sets the scale for a given object and interpolates over the given number of frames to achieve that scale

name: objects_attach
description: attaches the second object to the first; both strings can be empty

name: objects_detach
description: detaches from the given parent object the given child object

name: garbage_collect_now
description: causes all garbage objects except those visible to a player to be collected immediately

name: object_cannot_take_damage
description: prevents an object from taking damage

name: object_can_take_damage
description: allows an object to take damage again

name: object_beautify
description: makes an object pretty for the remainder of the levels' cutscenes.

name: objects_predict
description: loads textures necessary to draw a objects that are about to come on-screen.

name: object_type_predict
description: loads textures necessary to draw an object that's about to come on-screen.

name: object_pvs_activate
description: just another (old) name for object_pvs_set_object.

name: object_pvs_set_object
description: sets the specified object as the special place that activates everything it sees.

name: object_pvs_set_camera
description: sets the specified cutscene camera point as the special place that activates everything it sees.

name: object_pvs_clear
description: removes the special place that activates everything it sees.

name: render_lights
description: enables/disables dynamic lights

name: scenery_get_animation_time
description: returns the number of ticks remaining in a custom animation (or zero, if the animation is over).

name: scenery_animation_start
description: starts a custom animation playing on a piece of scenery

name: scenery_animation_start_at_frame
description: starts a custom animation playing on a piece of scenery at a specific frame

name: unit_can_blink
description: allows a unit to blink or not (units never blink when they are dead)

name: unit_open
description: opens the hatches on the given unit

name: unit_close
description: closes the hatches on a given unit

name: unit_kill
description: kills a given unit, no saving throw

name: unit_kill_silent
description: kills a given unit silently (doesn't make them play their normal death animation or sound)

name: unit_get_custom_animation_time
description: returns the number of ticks remaining in a unit's custom animation (or zero, if the animation is over).

name: unit_stop_custom_animation
description: stops the custom animation running on the given unit.

name: unit_custom_animation_at_frame
description: starts a custom animation playing on a unit at a specific frame index(interpolates into animation if next to last parameter is TRUE)

name: custom_animation
description: starts a custom animation playing on a unit (interpolates into animation if last parameter is TRUE)

name: custom_animation_list
description: starts a custom animation playing on a unit list (interpolates into animation if last parameter is TRUE)

name: unit_is_playing_custom_animation
description: returns TRUE if the given unit is still playing a custom animation

name: unit_aim_without_turning
description: allows a unit to aim in place without turning

name: unit_set_emotion
description: sets a unit's facial expression (-1 is none, other values depend on unit)

name: unit_set_enterable_by_player
description: can be used to prevent the player from entering a vehicle

name: unit_enter_vehicle
description: puts the specified unit in the specified vehicle (in the named seat)

name: vehicle_test_seat_list
description: tests whether the named seat has an object in the object list

name: vehicle_test_seat
description: tests whether the named seat has a specified unit in it

name: unit_set_emotion_animation
description: sets the emotion animation to be used for the given unit

name: unit_exit_vehicle
description: makes a unit exit its vehicle

name: unit_set_maximum_vitality
description: sets a unit's maximum body and shield vitality

name: units_set_maximum_vitality
description: sets a group of units' maximum body and shield vitality

name: unit_set_current_vitality
description: sets a unit's current body and shield vitality

name: units_set_current_vitality
description: sets a group of units' current body and shield vitality

name: vehicle_load_magic
description: makes a list of units (named or by encounter) magically get into a vehicle, in the substring-specified seats (e.g. CD-passenger... empty string matches all seats)

name: vehicle_unload
description: makes units get out of a vehicle from the substring-specified seats (e.g. CD-passenger... empty string matches all seats)

name: magic_seat_name
description: all units controlled by the player will assume the given seat name (valid values are 'asleep', 'alert', 'stand', 'crouch' and 'flee')

name: unit_set_seat
description: this unit will assume the named seat

name: magic_melee_attack
description: causes player's unit to start a melee attack

name: vehicle_riders
description: returns a list of all riders in a vehicle

name: vehicle_driver
description: returns the driver of a vehicle

name: vehicle_gunner
description: returns the gunner of a vehicle

name: unit_get_health
description: returns the health [0,1] of the unit, returns -1 if the unit does not exists

name: unit_get_shield
description: returns the shield [0,1] of the unit, returns -1 if the unit does not exists

name: unit_get_total_grenade_count
description: returns the total number of grenades for the given unit, 0 if it does not exist

name: unit_has_weapon
description: returns TRUE if the <unit> has <object> as a weapon, FALSE otherwise

name: unit_has_weapon_readied
description: returns TRUE if the <unit> has <object> as the primary weapon, FALSE otherwise

name: unit_doesnt_drop_items
description: prevents any of the given units from dropping weapons or grenades when they die

name: unit_impervious
description: prevents any of the given units from being knocked around or playing ping animations

name: unit_suspended
description: stops gravity from working on the given unit

name: unit_solo_player_integrated_night_vision_is_active
description: returns whether the night-vision mode could be activated via the flashlight button

name: units_set_desired_flashlight_state
description: sets the units' desired flashlight state

name: unit_set_desired_flashlight_state
description: sets the unit's desired flashlight state

name: unit_get_current_flashlight_state
description: gets the unit's current flashlight state

name: device_set_never_appears_locked
description: changes a machine's never_appears_locked flag, but only if paul is a bastard

name: device_get_power
description: gets the current power of a named device

name: device_set_power
description: immediately sets the power of a named device to the given value

name: device_set_position
description: set the desired position of the given device (used for devices without explicit device groups)

name: device_get_position
description: gets the current position of the given device (used for devices without explicit device groups)

name: device_set_position_immediate
description: instantaneously changes the position of the given device (used for devices without explicit device groups

name: device_group_get
description: returns the desired value of the specified device group.

name: device_group_set
description: changes the desired value of the specified device group.

name: device_group_set_immediate
description: instantaneously changes the value of the specified device group.

name: device_one_sided_set
description: TRUE makes the given device one-sided (only able to be opened from one direction), FALSE makes it two-sided

name: device_operates_automatically_set
description: TRUE makes the given device open automatically when any biped is nearby, FALSE makes it not

name: device_group_change_only_once_more_set
description: TRUE allows a device to change states only once

name: breakable_surfaces_reset
description: restores all breakable surfaces

name: cheat_all_powerups
description: drops all powerups near player

name: cheat_all_weapons
description: drops all weapons near player

name: cheat_spawn_warthog
description: drops a warthog near player

name: cheat_all_vehicles
description: drops all vehicles on player

name: cheat_teleport_to_camera
description: teleports player to camera location

name: cheat_active_camouflage
description: gives the player active camouflage

name: cheat_active_camouflage_local_player
description: gives the player active camouflage

name: cheats_load
description: reloads the cheats.txt file

name: ai_free
description: removes a group of actors from their encounter and sets them free

name: ai_free_units
description: removes a set of units from their encounter (if any) and sets them free

name: ai_attach
description: attaches the specified unit to the specified encounter.

name: ai_attach_free
description: attaches a unit to a newly created free actor of the specified type

name: ai_detach
description: detaches the specified unit from all AI.

name: ai_place
description: places the specified encounter on the map.

name: ai_kill
description: instantly kills the specified encounter and/or squad.

name: ai_kill_silent
description: instantly and silently (no animation or sound played) kills the specified encounter and/or squad.

name: ai_erase
description: erases the specified encounter and/or squad.

name: ai_erase_all
description: erases all AI.

name: ai_select
description: selects the specified encounter.

name: ai_deselect
description: clears the selected encounter.

name: ai_spawn_actor
description: spawns a single actor in the specified encounter and/or squad.

name: ai_set_respawn
description: enables or disables respawning in the specified encounter.

name: ai_set_deaf
description: enables or disables hearing for actors in the specified encounter.

name: ai_set_blind
description: enables or disables sight for actors in the specified encounter.

name: ai_magically_see_encounter
description: makes one encounter magically aware of another.

name: ai_magically_see_players
description: makes an encounter magically aware of nearby players.

name: ai_magically_see_unit
description: makes an encounter magically aware of the specified unit.

name: ai_timer_start
description: makes a squad's delay timer start counting.

name: ai_timer_expire
description: makes a squad's delay timer expire and releases them to enter combat.

name: ai_attack
description: makes the specified platoon(s) go into the attacking state.

name: ai_defend
description: makes the specified platoon(s) go into the defending state.

name: ai_retreat
description: makes all squads in the specified platoon(s) maneuver to their designated maneuver squads.

name: ai_maneuver
description: makes all squads in the specified platoon(s) maneuver to their designated maneuver squads.

name: ai_maneuver_enable
description: enables or disables the maneuver/retreat rule for an encounter or platoon. the rule will still trigger, but none of the actors will be given the order to change squads.

name: ai_migrate
description: makes all or part of an encounter move to another encounter.

name: ai_migrate_and_speak
description: makes all or part of an encounter move to another encounter, and say their 'advance' or 'retreat' speech lines.

name: ai_migrate_by_unit
description: makes a named vehicle or group of units move to another encounter.

name: ai_allegiance
description: creates an allegiance between two teams.

name: ai_allegiance_remove
description: destroys an allegiance between two teams.

name: ai_living_count
description: return the number of living actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

name: ai_living_fraction
description: return the fraction [0-1] of living actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

name: ai_strength
description: return the current strength (average body vitality from 0-1) of the specified encounter and/or squad.

name: ai_swarm_count
description: return the number of swarm actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

name: ai_nonswarm_count
description: return the number of non-swarm actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

name: ai_actors
description: converts an ai reference to an object list.

name: ai_go_to_vehicle
description: tells a group of actors to get into a vehicle, in the substring-specified seats (e.g. passenger for pelican)... does not interrupt any actors who are already going to vehicles

name: ai_go_to_vehicle_override
description: tells a group of actors to get into a vehicle, in the substring-specified seats (e.g. passenger for pelican)... NB: any actors who are already going to vehicles will stop and go to this one instead!

name: ai_going_to_vehicle
description: return the number of actors that are still trying to get into the specified vehicle

name: ai_exit_vehicle
description: tells a group of actors to get out of any vehicles that they are in

name: ai_braindead
description: makes a group of actors braindead, or restores them to life (in their initial state)

name: ai_braindead_by_unit
description: makes a list of objects braindead, or restores them to life. if you pass in a vehicle index, it makes all actors in that vehicle braindead (including any built-in guns)

name: ai_disregard
description: if TRUE, forces all actors to completely disregard the specified units, otherwise lets them acknowledge the units again

name: ai_prefer_target
description: if TRUE, *ALL* enemies will prefer to attack the specified units. if FALSE, removes the preference.

name: ai_teleport_to_starting_location
description: teleports a group of actors to the starting locations of their current squad(s)

name: ai_teleport_to_starting_location_if_unsupported
description: teleports a group of actors to the starting locations of their current squad(s), only if they are not supported by solid ground (i.e. if they are falling after switching BSPs)

name: ai_renew
description: refreshes the health and grenade count of a group of actors, so they are as good as new

name: ai_try_to_fight_nothing
description: removes the preferential target setting from a group of actors

name: ai_try_to_fight
description: causes a group of actors to preferentially target another group of actors

name: ai_try_to_fight_player
description: causes a group of actors to preferentially target the player

name: ai_command_list
description: tells a group of actors to begin executing the specified command list

name: ai_command_list_by_unit
description: tells a named unit to begin executing the specified command list

name: ai_command_list_advance
description: tells a group of actors that are running a command list that they may advance further along the list (if they are waiting for a stimulus)

name: ai_command_list_advance_by_unit
description: just like ai_command_list_advance but operates upon a unit instead

name: ai_command_list_status
description: gets the status of a number of units running command lists: 0 = none, 1 = finished command list, 2 = waiting for stimulus, 3 = running command list

name: ai_is_attacking
description: returns whether a platoon is in the attacking mode (or if an encounter is specified, returns whether any platoon in that encounter is attacking)

name: ai_force_active
description: forces an encounter to remain active (i.e. not freeze in place) even if there are no players nearby

name: ai_force_active_by_unit
description: forces a named actor that is NOT in an encounter to remain active (i.e. not freeze in place) even if there are no players nearby

name: ai_set_return_state
description: sets the state that a group of actors will return to when they have nothing to do

name: ai_set_current_state
description: sets the current state of a group of actors. WARNING: may have unpredictable results on actors that are in combat

name: ai_playfight
description: sets an encounter to be playfighting or not

name: ai_status
description: returns the most severe combat status of a group of actors (0=inactive, 1=noncombat, 2=guarding, 3=search/suspicious, 4=definite enemy(heard or magic awareness), 5=visible enemy, 6=engaging in combat.

name: ai_reconnect
description: reconnects all AI information to the current structure bsp (use this after you create encounters or command lists in sapien, or place new firing points or command list points)

name: ai_vehicle_encounter
description: sets a vehicle to 'belong' to a particular encounter/squad. any actors who get into the vehicle will be placed in this squad. NB: vehicles potentially drivable by multiple teams need their own encounter!

name: ai_vehicle_enterable_distance
description: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for actors within a certain distance

name: ai_vehicle_enterable_team
description: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for actors on a certain team

name: ai_vehicle_enterable_actor_type
description: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for actors of a certain type (grunt, elite, marine etc)

name: ai_vehicle_enterable_actors
description: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for a certain encounter/squad of actors

name: ai_vehicle_enterable_disable
description: disables actors from impulsively getting into a vehicle (this is the default state for newly placed vehicles)

name: ai_look_at_object
description: tells an actor to look at an object until further notice

name: ai_stop_looking
description: tells an actor to stop looking at whatever it's looking at

name: ai_automatic_migration_target
description: enables or disables a squad as being an automatic migration target

name: ai_follow_target_disable
description: turns off following for an encounter

name: ai_follow_target_players
description: sets the follow target for an encounter to be the closest player

name: ai_follow_target_unit
description: sets the follow target for an encounter to be a specific unit

name: ai_follow_target_ai
description: sets the follow target for an encounter to be a group of AI (encounter, squad or platoon)

name: ai_follow_distance
description: sets the distance threshold which will cause squads to migrate when following someone

name: ai_conversation
description: tries to add an entry to the list of conversations waiting to play. returns FALSE if the required units could not be found to play the conversation, or if the player is too far away and the 'delay' flag is not set.

name: ai_conversation_stop
description: stops a conversation from playing or trying to play

name: ai_conversation_advance
description: tells a conversation that it may advance

name: ai_conversation_line
description: returns which line the conversation is currently playing, or 999 if the conversation is not currently playing

name: ai_conversation_status
description: returns the status of a conversation (0=none, 1=trying to begin, 2=waiting for guys to get in position, 3=playing, 4=waiting to advance, 5=could not begin, 6=finished successfully, 7=aborted midway

name: ai_link_activation
description: links the first encounter so that it will be made active whenever it detects that the second encounter is active

name: ai_berserk
description: forces a group of actors to start or stop berserking

name: ai_set_team
description: makes an encounter change to a new team

name: ai_allow_charge
description: either enables or disables charging behavior for a group of actors

name: ai_allow_dormant
description: either enables or disables automatic dormancy for a group of actors

name: ai_allegiance_broken
description: returns whether two teams have an allegiance that is currently broken by traitorous behavior

name: camera_control
description: toggles script control of the camera.

name: camera_set
description: moves the camera to the specified camera point over the specified number of ticks.

name: camera_set_relative
description: moves the camera to the specified camera point over the specified number of ticks (position is relative to the specified object).

name: camera_set_animation
description: begins a prerecorded camera animation.

name: camera_set_first_person
description: makes the scripted camera follow a unit.

name: camera_set_dead
description: makes the scripted camera zoom out around a unit as if it were dead.

name: camera_time
description: returns the number of ticks remaining in the current camera interpolation.

name: debug_camera_load
description: loads the saved camera position and facing.

name: debug_camera_save
description: saves the camera position and facing.

name: game_speed
description: changes the game speed.

name: game_time
description: gets ticks elapsed since the start of the game.

name: game_variant
description: set the game engine

name: game_difficulty_get
description: returns the current difficulty setting, but lies to you and will never return easy, instead returning normal

name: game_difficulty_get_real
description: returns the actual current difficulty setting without lying

name: profile_service_clear_timers
description: clears the timers that are present in the profiling service

name: profile_service_dump_timers
description: dumps the profiling service timers

name: map_reset
description: starts the map from the beginning.

name: map_name
description: changes the name of the solo player map.

name: multiplayer_map_name
description: changes the name of the multiplayer map

name: game_difficulty_set
description: changes the difficulty setting for the next map to be loaded.

name: crash
description: crashes (for debugging).

name: switch_bsp
description: takes off your condom and changes to a different structure bsp

name: structure_bsp_index
description: returns the current structure bsp index

name: version
description: prints the build version.

name: playback
description: starts game in film playback mode

name: quit
description: quits the game

name: texture_cache_flush
description: don't make me kick your ass

name: sound_cache_flush
description: i'm a rebel!

name: sound_cache_dump_to_file
description: dump dat shit!

name: debug_memory
description: dumps memory leaks.

name: debug_memory_by_file
description: dumps memory leaks by source file.

name: debug_memory_for_file
description: dumps memory leaks from the specified source file.

name: debug_tags
description: writes all memory being used by tag files into tag_dump.txt

name: profile_reset
description: resets profiling data.

name: profile_dump
description: dumps profile based on a substring.

name: profile_activate
description: activates profile sections based on a substring.

name: profile_deactivate
description: deactivates profile sections based on a substring.

name: profile_graph_toggle
description: enables or disables profile graph display of a particular value.

name: debug_pvs
description: displays the current pvs.

name: ai
description: turns all AI on or off.

name: ai_dialogue_triggers
description: turns impromptu dialogue on or off.

name: ai_grenades
description: turns grenade inventory on or off.

name: ai_lines
description: cycles through AI line-spray modes

name: ai_debug_sound_point_set
description: drops the AI debugging sound point at the camera location

name: ai_debug_vocalize
description: makes the selected AI vocalize

name: ai_debug_teleport_to
description: teleports all players to the specified encounter

name: ai_debug_speak
description: makes the currently selected AI speak a vocalization (e.g. ai_speak "pain minor")

name: ai_debug_speak_list
description: makes the currently selected AI speak a list of vocalizations (e.g. ai_speak_list "involuntary")

name: fade_in
description: does a screen fade in from a particular color

name: fade_out
description: does a screen fade out to a particular color

name: cinematic_start
description: initializes game to start a cinematic (interruptive) cutscene

name: cinematic_stop
description: initializes the game to end a cinematic (interruptive) cutscene

name: cinematic_abort
description: aborts a cinematic

name: cinematic_show_letterbox
description: sets or removes the letterbox bars

name: cinematic_set_title
description: activates the chapter title

name: cinematic_set_title_delayed
description: activates the chapter title, delayed by <real> seconds

name: cinematic_suppress_bsp_object_creation
description: suppresses or enables the automatic creation of objects during cutscenes due to a bsp switch

name: game_won
description: causes the player to successfully finish the current level and move to the next

name: game_lost
description: causes the player to revert to his previous saved game

name: game_safe_to_save
description: returns FALSE if it would be a bad idea to save the player's game right now

name: game_all_quiet
description: returns FALSE if there are bad guys around, projectiles in the air, etc.

name: game_safe_to_speak
description: returns FALSE if it would be a bad idea to save the player's game right now

name: game_is_cooperative
description: returns TRUE if the game is cooperative

name: game_save
description: checks to see if it is safe to save game, then saves (gives up after 8 seconds)

name: game_save_cancel
description: cancels any pending game_save, timeout or not

name: game_save_no_timeout
description: checks to see if it is safe to save game, then saves (this version never gives up)

name: game_save_totally_unsafe
description: disregards player's current situation

name: game_saving
description: checks to see if the game is trying to save the map.

name: game_revert
description: reverts to last saved game, if any (for testing, the first bastard that does this to me gets it in the head)

name: game_reverted
description: don't use this for anything, you black-hearted bastards.

name: core_save
description: saves debug game state to core\core.bin

name: core_save_name
description: saves debug game state to core\<path>

name: core_load
description: loads debug game state from core\core.bin

name: core_load_at_startup
description: loads debug game state from core\core.bin as soon as the map is initialized

name: core_load_name
description: loads debug game state from core\<path>

name: core_load_name_at_startup
description: loads debug game state from core\<path> as soon as the map is initialized

name: game_skip_ticks
description: skips <short> amount of game ticks. ONLY USE IN CUTSCENES!!!

name: sound_impulse_predict
description: loads an impulse sound into the sound cache ready for playback.

name: sound_impulse_start
description: plays an impulse sound from the specified source object (or "none"), with the specified scale.

name: sound_impulse_time
description: returns the time remaining for the specified impulse sound.

name: sound_impulse_stop
description: stops the specified impulse sound.

name: sound_looping_predict
description: your mom.

name: sound_looping_start
description: plays a looping sound from the specified source object (or "none"), with the specified scale.

name: sound_looping_stop
description: stops the specified looping sound.

name: sound_looping_set_scale
description: changes the scale of the sound (which should affect the volume) within the range 0 to 1.

name: sound_looping_set_alternate
description: enables or disables the alternate loop/alternate end for a looping sound.

name: debug_sounds_enable
description: enables or disabled all sound classes matching the substring.

name: debug_sounds_distances
description: changes the minimum and maximum distances for all sound classes matching the substring.

name: debug_sounds_wet
description: changes the reverb level for all sound classes matching the substring.

name: sound_enable
description: enables or disables all sound.

name: sound_set_master_gain
description: Set the game's master gain

name: sound_get_master_gain
description: Returns the game's master gain

name: sound_set_music_gain
description: Set the game's music gain

name: sound_get_music_gain
description: Returns the game's music gain

name: sound_set_effects_gain
description: Set the game's effects gain

name: sound_get_effects_gain
description: Returns the game's effects gain

name: sound_class_set_gain
description: changes the gain on the specified sound class(es) to the specified game over the specified number of ticks.

name: vehicle_hover
description: stops the vehicle from running real physics and runs fake hovering physics instead.

name: players_unzoom_all
description: resets zoom levels on all players

name: player_enable_input
description: toggle player input. the player can still free-look, but nothing else.

name: player_camera_control
description: enables/disables camera control globally

name: player_action_test_reset
description: resets the player action test state so that all tests will return false.

name: player_action_test_jump
description: returns true if any player has jumped since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

name: player_action_test_primary_trigger
description: returns true if any player has used primary trigger since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

name: player_action_test_grenade_trigger
description: returns true if any player has used grenade trigger since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

name: player_action_test_zoom
description: returns true if any player has hit the zoom button since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

name: player_action_test_action
description: returns true if any player has hit the action key since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

name: player_action_test_accept
description: returns true if any player has hit accept since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

name: player_action_test_back
description: returns true if any player has hit the back key since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

name: player_action_test_look_relative_up
description: returns true if any player has looked up since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

name: player_action_test_look_relative_down
description: returns true if any player has looked down since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

name: player_action_test_look_relative_left
description: returns true if any player has looked left since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

name: player_action_test_look_relative_right
description: returns true if any player has looked right since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

name: player_action_test_look_relative_all_directions
description: returns true if any player has looked up, down, left, and right since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

name: player_action_test_move_relative_all_directions
description: returns true if any player has moved forward, backward, left, and right since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

name: player_add_equipment
description: adds/resets the player's health, shield, and inventory (weapons and grenades) to the named profile. resets if third parameter is true, adds if false.

name: show_hud
description: shows or hides the hud

name: show_hud_help_text
description: shows or hides the hud help text

name: enable_hud_help_flash
description: starts/stops the help text flashing

name: hud_help_flash_restart
description: resets the timer for the help text flashing

name: activate_nav_point_flag
description: activates a nav point type <string> attached to (local) player <unit> anchored to a flag with a vertical offset <real>. If the player is not local to the machine, this will fail

name: activate_nav_point_object
description: activates a nav point type <string> attached to (local) player <unit> anchored to an object with a vertical offset <real>. If the player is not local to the machine, this will fail

name: activate_team_nav_point_flag
description: activates a nav point type <string> attached to a team anchored to a flag with a vertical offset <real>. If the player is not local to the machine, this will fail

name: activate_team_nav_point_object
description: activates a nav point type <string> attached to a team anchored to an object with a vertical offset <real>. If the player is not local to the machine, this will fail

name: deactivate_nav_point_flag
description: deactivates a nav point type attached to a player <unit> anchored to a flag

name: deactivate_nav_point_object
description: deactivates a nav point type attached to a player <unit> anchored to an object

name: deactivate_team_nav_point_flag
description: deactivates a nav point type attached to a team anchored to a flag

name: deactivate_team_nav_point_object
description: deactivates a nav point type attached to a team anchored to an object

name: hud_team_icon_set_pos
description: shit

name: hud_team_icon_set_scale
description: shit

name: hud_team_background_set_pos
description: shit

name: hud_team_background_set_scale
description: shit

name: cls
description: clears console text from the screen

name: connect
description: Attempt to connect to server - use ip:port password as parameters

name: disconnect
description: Disconnect from a server

name: hammer_begin
description: hammers the server by connecting and disconnecting repeatedly.

name: hammer_stop
description: stops hammering the server.

name: network_server_dump
description: Dumps info on network server.

name: network_client_dump
description: Dumps info on network client.

name: net_graph_clear
description: Clears the net_graph.

name: net_graph_show
description: Changes the net_graph display (bytes/packets, sent/received)

name: play_update_history
description: Playback client input history starting from the specified last completed update id.

name: show_player_update_stats
description: Shows update history playback stats.

name: message_metrics_clear
description: clears network messaging metrics

name: message_metrics_dump
description: dumps network messaging metrics to given file ("" for default)

name: error_overflow_suppression
description: enables or disables the suppression of error spamming

name: structure_lens_flares_place
description: places lens flares in the structure bsp

name: player_effect_set_max_rotation
description: <yaw> <pitch> <roll>

name: player_effect_set_max_rumble
description: <left> <right>

name: player_effect_start
description: <max_intensity> <attack time>

name: player_effect_stop
description: <decay>

name: hud_show_health
description: hides/shows the health panel

name: hud_blink_health
description: starts/stops manual blinking of the health panel

name: hud_show_shield
description: hides/shows the shield panel

name: hud_blink_shield
description: starts/stops manual blinking of the shield panel

name: hud_show_motion_sensor
description: hides/shows the motion sensor panel

name: hud_blink_motion_sensor
description: starts/stops manual blinking of the motion sensor panel

name: hud_show_crosshair
description: hides/shows the weapon crosshair

name: hud_clear_messages
description: clears all non-state messages on the hud

name: hud_set_help_text
description: displays <message> as the help text

name: hud_set_objective_text
description: sets <message> as the current objective

name: hud_set_timer_time
description: sets the time for the timer to <short> minutes and <short> seconds, and starts and displays timer

name: hud_set_timer_warning_time
description: sets the warning time for the timer to <short> minutes and <short> seconds

name: hud_set_timer_position
description: sets the timer upper left position to (x, y)=>(<short>, <short>)

name: show_hud_timer
description: displays the hud timer

name: pause_hud_timer
description: pauses or unpauses the hud timer

name: hud_get_timer_ticks
description: returns the ticks left on the hud timer

name: time_code_show
description: shows the time code timer

name: time_code_start
description: starts/stops the time code timer

name: time_code_reset
description: resets the time code timer

name: rasterizer_reload_effects
description: check for shader changes

name: set_gamma
description: set the gamma

name: rasterizer_fixed_function_ambient
description: set the ambient light value for fixed function

name: rasterizer_decals_flush
description: flush all decals

name: rasterizer_fps_accumulate
description: average fps

name: script_screen_effect_set_value
description: sets a screen effect script value

name: cinematic_screen_effect_start
description: starts screen effect; pass TRUE to clear

name: cinematic_screen_effect_set_convolution
description: sets the convolution effect

name: cinematic_screen_effect_set_filter
description: sets the filter effect

name: cinematic_screen_effect_set_filter_desaturation_tint
description: sets the desaturation filter tint color

name: cinematic_screen_effect_set_video
description: sets the video effect: <noise intensity[0,1]>, <overbright: 0=none, 1=2x, 2=4x>

name: cinematic_screen_effect_stop
description: returns control of the screen effects to the rest of the game

name: delete_save_game_files
description: delete all custom profile files

name: fast_setup_network_server
description: sets up a network server with the given map name, game variant, and true for remote connections, false for not

name: profile_unlock_solo_levels
description: unlocks all the solo player levels for player 1's profile

name: player0_look_invert_pitch
description: invert player0's look

name: player0_look_pitch_is_inverted
description: returns TRUE if player0's look pitch is inverted

name: player0_joystick_set_is_normal
description: returns TRUE if player0 is using the normal joystick set

name: ui_widget_show_path
description: blah blah

name: display_scenario_help
description: display in-game help dialog

name: sound_enable_eax
description: Enable or disable EAX extensions

name: sound_eax_enabled
description: Returns true if EAX extensions are enabled

name: sound_set_env
description: Change environment preset

name: sound_enable_hardware
description: Enable or disable hardware sound buffers

name: sound_set_supplementary_buffers
description: Set the amount of supplementary buffers

name: sound_get_supplementary_buffers
description: Get the amount of supplementary buffers

name: sound_set_rolloff
description: Set the DSound rolloff value

name: sound_set_factor
description: Set the DSound factor value

name: input_get_joy_count
description: test function to return the number of joysticks enumerated

name: input_is_joy_active
description: test function to determine if an enumerated joystick is activated or not

name: input_activate_joy
description: activates an enumerated joystick into a logical joystick slot

name: input_deactivate_joy
description: deactivates an enumerated joystick, freeing up the logical joystick slot

name: input_find_joystick
description: test function to find a joystick by GUID (string representation)

name: input_show_joystick_info
description: test function to show the enumerated joystick information for all joystick

name: input_find_default
description: test function that looks up a default profile for a deviceid

name: config_one_control
description: test function to configure a single control

name: get_yaw_rate
description: gets the yaw rate for the given player number

name: get_pitch_rate
description: gets the yaw rate for the given player number

name: set_yaw_rate
description: sets the yaw rate for the given player number

name: set_pitch_rate
description: sets the yaw rate for the given player number

name: get_digital_forward_throttle
description: gets the amount of forward throttle applied by digital device stimuli

name: set_digital_forward_throttle
description: sets the amount of forward throttle applied by digital device stimuli

name: get_digital_strafe_throttle
description: gets the amount of strafe throttle applied by digital device stimuli

name: set_digital_strafe_throttle
description: sets the amount of strafe throttle applied by digital device stimuli

name: get_digital_yaw_increment
description: gets the increment in yaw applied by digital device stimuli

name: set_digital_yaw_increment
description: sets the increment in yaw applied by digital device stimuli

name: get_digital_pitch_increment
description: gets the increment in pitch applied by digital device stimuli

name: set_digital_pitch_increment
description: sets the increment in pitch applied by digital device stimuli

name: get_mouse_forward_threshold
description: gets the threshold beyond which mouse movement is full forward throttle

name: set_mouse_forward_threshold
description: sets the threshold beyond which mouse movement is full forward throttle

name: get_mouse_strafe_threshold
description: gets the threshold beyond which mouse movement is full strafe throttle

name: set_mouse_strafe_threshold
description: sets the threshold beyond which mouse movement is full strafe throttle

name: get_mouse_yaw_scale
description: gets the scale for mouse control of yaw

name: set_mouse_yaw_scale
description: sets the scale for mouse control of yaw

name: get_mouse_pitch_scale
description: gets the scale for mouse control of pitch

name: set_mouse_pitch_scale
description: sets the scale for mouse control of pitch

name: get_gamepad_forward_threshold
description: gets the threshold beyond which gamepad movement is full forward throttle

name: set_gamepad_forward_threshold
description: sets the threshold beyond which gamepad movement is full forward throttle

name: get_gamepad_strafe_threshold
description: gets the threshold beyond which gamepad movement is full strafe throttle

name: set_gamepad_strafe_threshold
description: sets the threshold beyond which gamepad movement is full strafe throttle

name: get_gamepad_yaw_scale
description: gets the scale for gamepad control of yaw

name: set_gamepad_yaw_scale
description: sets the scale for gamepad control of yaw

name: get_gamepad_pitch_scale
description: gets the scale for gamepad control of pitch

name: set_gamepad_pitch_scale
description: sets the scale for gamepad control of pitch

name: bind
description: binds an input device/button combination to a game control

name: unbind
description: unbinds an input device/button combination

name: print_binds
description: prints a list of all input bindings

name: sv_end_game
description: End the current game.

name: change_team
description: change your team (0=red,1=blue,else=auto

name: sv_mapcycle
description: Print the contents of the currently loaded mapcycle file

name: sv_mapcycle_begin
description: Restart or begin playing the currently loaded mapcycle file

name: sv_mapcycle_add
description:
Usage: sv_mapcycle_add <mapname> <variantname>
Add a new game to the end of the mapcycle file.

name: sv_mapcycle_del
description:
Usage: sv_mapcycle_del <index> 
Removes the game at <index>.  Will not affect running games.

name: sv_map_next
description: <Server Only> Abort the current game and begin the next game in the playlist

name: sv_map_reset
description: <Server Only> Reset the current game

name: sv_map
description:
<Server Only> Usage: "sv_map <mapname> <variantname>" 
Abort current game and playlist and start specified game

name: rcon
description: Sends a command for server to execute at console. Use \" to send quotes.

name: sv_rcon_password
description:
Sets the server remote console password. If no password is given, displays the
 current password. Enter "" to disable rcon.

name: sv_say
description:
<Server Only> Usage: "sv_say <message>" 
Send a message to users

name: sv_players
description: <Server Only> Print a list of players in the current game

name: sv_kick
description:
<Server Only> Usage: sv_kick <player # or name>  
Kicks the specified player from the server

name: sv_ban
description:
<Server Only> Player is kicked and added to banned.txt.  Use sv_players to find the index.
Specify optional duration for timed ban.  Use 0 to follow sv_ban_penalty rules.

name: sv_banlist
description: Print a list of banned players

name: sv_unban
description:
<Server Only> Usage: sv_unban <index> 
Removes player at index in the banlist.  Use sv_banlist to find the index

name: sv_parameters_reload
description:
<Server Only> Usage: sv_parameters_reload 
Reloads the parameters.cfg file.

name: sv_parameters_dump
description: Dumps out the local parameter configuration to parameters.cfg file.

name: sv_status
description: Shows status of the server

name: sv_name
description: Sets the name of the server. If no name is given, displays the current name.

name: sv_password
description:
Sets the server password. If no password is given, displays the
current password.

name: sv_log_note
description: Leave a note in the server log

name: sv_log_file
description:
Sets the server log file name. If no name is given, displays the
current log file name.

name: sv_log_enabled
description:
Enables or disables server logging. If 0/1 is not given, displays the
current logging status.

name: sv_log_rotation_threshold
description:
Sets the log rotation threshold. When a log file's size (in kilobytes) exceeds
this number, it will be rotated. Set to 0 to disable log rotation.
If the threshold is not specified, displays the current threshold.

name: sv_log_echo_chat
description:
Enables or disbles chat echo to the console. Set the preference to 0
to disable chat echo, or 1 to enable chat echo.
If the preference is not specified, displays the current preference.

name: profile_load
description: Load any included builtin profiles and create profiles on disk.

name: track_remote_player_position_updates
description: Sets the name of the remote player whose position update are to be tracked.

name: remote_player_stats
description: Displays the prediction stats of the specified remote player.

name: sv_get_player_action_queue_length
description: Displays the action queue length for the specified player.

name: thread_sleep
description: Sleeps the calling thread for the specified number of ms.

name: checkpoint_save
description: save last solo checkpoint

name: checkpoint_load
description: load a saved checkpoint

name: sv_maplist
description: Display a list of maps, matching an optional substring.

name: sv_gamelist
description: Display a list of game types, matching an optional substring.

name: sv_friendly_fire
description: Use to provide a global override for the gametype friendly fire setting.

name: sv_timelimit
description: Use to provide a global override for the gametype timelimit setting.

name: sv_ban_penalty
description: Specify up to 4 ban times for repeat ban/TK offenders.

name: sv_tk_grace
description: Specify the grace period for TK during which you don't get a TK point.

name: sv_tk_cooldown
description: Specify a TK point cooldown period, after which players lose a TK point.

name: sv_banlist_file
description: Sets and opens the file to be used for the player ban list.

name: sv_maxplayers
description: Sets the maximum number of players (between 1 and 16). If no value is given, displays the current value.

name: sv_single_flag_force_reset
description:
Force the flag to reset in single flag CTF games when the timer expires, even if held by a player.
If not specified, displays the current value.

name: sv_motd
description:
Sets the server message of the day file name. If no name is given, displays the
current motd file name. Set to "" to turn motd off.

name: oid_watch
description: Sets/displays translated object table watch parameters.

name: oid_dump
description: dumps the whole translated object table to network.log

name: oid_status
description: displays the status of the translated object table.
